vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of United Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ki.4.5;
son of: Nathan (H5416H);
brother of: Azariah (H5838H)
§ Zabud = "given"
a priest, son of Nathan, who held the post of 'king's friend' to Solomon
vocabInfos._es_Definition: hijo de Natán; amigo de David
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
撒布得 这个陽性專有名詞在希伯來文的意思是 "給與"
一位祭司, 所羅門王的朋友拿單的兒子 (王上4:5)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
撒布得 这个阳性专有名词在希伯来文的意思是 "给与"
一位祭司, 所罗门王的朋友拿单的儿子 (王上4:5)
